Method Detail

calculatePeScore

public double calculatePeScore(java.lang.String initState,
                               java.util.List<OpWsdl> workflowOPs,
                               OpWsdl candidateOP)
check whether current state entails precondition of candidate operation given initial state to initialize current state, and then update current state with effect of operations in the given workflow iteratively then test if current state entail precondition of candidate operation, return 1 else return 0 if candidate op has no precondition, return 0

Parameters:
initState - initial state file name, can be null
workflowOPs - all operations in current workflow, allow some operations have no effect
candidateOP - candidate operation, if no precondition, score=0
Returns:

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Parameters:
args -
